definition: surname Suo/abbr. for 索馬里|索马里[Suo3 ma3 li3], Somalia
to search/to demand/to ask/to exact/large rope/isolated

sentences.english: We have to try to figure out what Saussure is up to.
sentences.chinese: 我們現在來討論索緒爾。

sentences.english: We'll do all this next time before we get into Saussure.
sentences.chinese: 我們會在下次講索緒爾之前講到這點。

sentences.english: It is very much the same with language, or "langue" as Saussure calls it.
sentences.chinese: 語言也是這樣，根據索緒爾的理論。

sentences.english: What is a sign? Saussure's famous diagrams make it clear enough.
sentences.chinese: 符號是什麼，讓我們來看看索緒爾有名的圖標。

sentences.english: Why is Saussure hailed as the father of modern linguistics?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼索緒爾被尊爲現代語言學之父？
